verses.text: \w For|strong="H1732"\w* \w the|strong="H1732"\w* choirmaster. \w A|strong="H3068"\w* \w Psalm|strong="H4210"\w* \w of|strong="H4210"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*. I waited patiently \w for|strong="H1732"\w* \w the|strong="H1732"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*; \w He|strong="H1732"\w* inclined \w to|strong="H1732"\w* me \w and|strong="H1732"\w* heard \w my|strong="H1732"\w* cry.

\w He|strong="H3068"\w* lifted \w me|strong="H8085"\w* up \w from|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* pit \w of|strong="H3068"\w* despair, \w out|strong="H5186"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* miry clay; \w He|strong="H3068"\w* set \w my|strong="H8085"\w* feet \w upon|strong="H5186"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* rock, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w made|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H8085"\w* footsteps firm.

\w He|strong="H5921"\w* \w put|strong="H5927"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* new song \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* mouth, \w a|strong="H3068"\w* hymn \w of|strong="H5921"\w* praise \w to|strong="H5927"\w* \w our|strong="H5921"\w* God. Many \w will|strong="H7272"\w* see \w and|strong="H6965"\w* fear \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w put|strong="H5927"\w* \w their|strong="H5921"\w* trust \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*.

Blessed \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w man|strong="H7200"\w* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w made|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* trust, \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H5414"\w* \w turned|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* proud, \w nor|strong="H3372"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* those \w who|strong="H3068"\w* lapse \w into|strong="H5414"\w* falsehood.

\w Many|strong="H3808"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*, \w are|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* wonders \w You|strong="H7760"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w done|strong="H7760"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* plans \w You|strong="H7760"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w us|strong="H7760"\w*—\w none|strong="H3808"\w* \w can|strong="H3808"\w* compare \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w You|strong="H7760"\w*—\w if|strong="H7760"\w* \w I|strong="H7760"\w* proclaim \w and|strong="H3068"\w* declare \w them|strong="H7760"\w*, \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w are|strong="H3068"\w* \w more|strong="H3808"\w* \w than|strong="H3808"\w* \w I|strong="H7760"\w* \w can|strong="H3808"\w* count.

\w Sacrifice|strong="H6213"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w offering|strong="H3068"\w* \w You|strong="H6213"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w not|strong="H6213"\w* desire, \w but|strong="H1696"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* ears \w You|strong="H6213"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* opened. \w Burnt|strong="H6213"\w* \w offerings|strong="H3068"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* sin \w offerings|strong="H3068"\w* \w You|strong="H6213"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w not|strong="H6213"\w* require.

\w Then|strong="H3808"\w* \w I|strong="H3808"\w* said, “Here \w I|strong="H3808"\w* am, \w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w have|strong="H2654"\w* come—\w it|strong="H3808"\w* \w is|strong="H5930"\w* written about \w me|strong="H7592"\w* \w in|strong="H2654"\w* \w the|strong="H3808"\w* scroll:

\w I|strong="H2009"\w* delight \w to|strong="H5921"\w* do \w Your|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H5612"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* God; \w Your|strong="H5921"\w* law \w is|strong="H2009"\w* \w within|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* heart.”

\w I|strong="H8432"\w* proclaim righteousness \w in|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w great|strong="H6213"\w* assembly; behold, \w I|strong="H8432"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w not|strong="H6213"\w* seal \w my|strong="H6213"\w* lips, \w as|strong="H6213"\w* \w You|strong="H6213"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w do|strong="H6213"\w* know.

\w I|strong="H2009"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* covered \w up|strong="H3607"\w* \w Your|strong="H3068"\w* \w righteousness|strong="H6664"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w heart|strong="H8193"\w*; \w I|strong="H2009"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w declared|strong="H3045"\w* \w Your|strong="H3068"\w* faithfulness \w and|strong="H3068"\w* salvation; \w I|strong="H2009"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* concealed \w Your|strong="H3068"\w* loving devotion \w and|strong="H3068"\w* faithfulness \w from|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w great|strong="H7227"\w* \w assembly|strong="H6951"\w*.

\w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, do \w not|strong="H3808"\w* withhold \w Your|strong="H3808"\w* \w mercy|strong="H2617"\w* \w from|strong="H3820"\w* \w me|strong="H3808"\w*; \w Your|strong="H3808"\w* loving \w devotion|strong="H2617"\w* \w and|strong="H2617"\w* \w faithfulness|strong="H2617"\w* \w will|strong="H3820"\w* always guard \w me|strong="H3808"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3068"\w* evils \w without|strong="H3808"\w* number surround \w me|strong="H4480"\w*; \w my|strong="H3068"\w* sins \w have|strong="H3068"\w* overtaken \w me|strong="H4480"\w*, \w so|strong="H4480"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w cannot|strong="H3808"\w* see. \w They|strong="H3068"\w* \w are|strong="H3068"\w* \w more|strong="H4480"\w* \w than|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* hairs \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* head, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* heart \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w failed|strong="H3808"\w* \w within|strong="H4480"\w* \w me|strong="H4480"\w*.

\w Be|strong="H3808"\w* pleased, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w to|strong="H5704"\w* deliver \w me|strong="H7200"\w*; hurry, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w help|strong="H5800"\w* \w me|strong="H7200"\w*.

\w May|strong="H3068"\w* those \w who|strong="H3068"\w* seek \w my|strong="H3068"\w* life \w be|strong="H3068"\w* ashamed \w and|strong="H3068"\w* confounded; \w may|strong="H3068"\w* those \w who|strong="H3068"\w* wish \w me|strong="H5337"\w* harm \w be|strong="H3068"\w* repelled \w and|strong="H3068"\w* humiliated.

\w May|strong="H5315"\w* \w those|strong="H5315"\w* \w who|strong="H5315"\w* say \w to|strong="H1245"\w* \w me|strong="H5315"\w*, “Aha, aha!” \w be|strong="H5315"\w* appalled \w at|strong="H5315"\w* \w their|strong="H1245"\w* \w own|strong="H5315"\w* \w shame|strong="H3637"\w*.

May \w all|strong="H5921"\w* who seek \w You|strong="H5921"\w* rejoice \w and|strong="H8074"\w* be glad \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w You|strong="H5921"\w*; may \w those|strong="H5921"\w* who love \w Your|strong="H5921"\w* salvation always say, “\w The|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* be magnified!”

\w But|strong="H3605"\w* \w I|strong="H3068"\w* \w am|strong="H3068"\w* poor \w and|strong="H3068"\w* needy; \w may|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* think \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H1245"\w*. \w You|strong="H3605"\w* \w are|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* helper \w and|strong="H3068"\w* deliverer; \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*, \w do|strong="H3068"\w* not delay.
